display_long_description:
Xtadium is the ultimate social VR and MR sports experience that combines the excitement of live, on-demand, and pay-per-view access to sporting events from NBA, NASCAR, TNT Sports, FOX Sports, ESPN, PSG and more!

- Experience NBA games courtside, with free live immersive games from the '24-'25 NBA season.

- Get transported to Paris for Live immersive games of PSG for free.

- NBA League Pass holders can access an exclusive Multi-Game NBA experience in Mixed Reality.

- Front Row from Home - Immerse yourself in a revolutionary VR sports experience by sitting in the front row from home.

- Mixed Reality - Content available in Virtual and Mixed Reality. Choose your favorite!

- Multicam Experience - Fans can view different camera angles simultaneously.

- Multigame experience - Exclusive Multi-Game experience and in live!

- Create Your Private Party -  Watch with your friends from anywhere.

- Check your social media while watching - Don’t miss anything from your social feeds.

- Hand tracking - Navigate the app with your hands, no need for controllers.

- Real-Time Statistics - Up-to-date stats and scores at your fingertips.

Follow us on Instagram, TikTok and Twitter/X @XtadiumVR or visit us at https://xtadiumvr.com/
